entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-la-Madeleine 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
